eq:
/*
This file was generated by Myokit.

desc: Voltage clamp model with standard compensation [1].

[1] Accounting for variability in ion current recordings using a
    mathematical model of artefacts in voltage-clamp experiments.
    Chon Lok Lei, Michael Clerx, Dominic G. Whittaker, David J. Gavaghan,
    Teun P. de Boer, Gary R. Mirams.
    Phil. Trans. R. Soc. A, 378: 20190348, 2020.
    https://doi.org/10.1098/rsta.2019.0348
display_name: Lei et al., 2020 Voltage clamp model adapted for API
mmt_authors: Chon Lok Lei
name: voltage_clamp_model_api_ikr
version: 20230221

*/

/* Input parameters */
/* E.g. in = [ varZero, varOne, varTwo ] */
in = [ ]

/* Engine: pace */
/* E.g.
  -80 * (1 - sigmoid((t-100)*5000))
  -120 * (sigmoid((t-100)*5000) - sigmoid((t-200)*5000))
*/
enginePace { 0.0 } /* engine.pace */

/* Constants: cell */
cellCm { 20.0 } /* cell.Cm [pF] */

/* Constants: extra */
extraKo { 5.4 } /* extra.Ko [mM] */
extraNao { 140.0 } /* extra.Nao [mM] */

/* Constants: ki */
kiKi { 130.0 } /* ki.Ki [mM] */

/* Constants: nai */
naiNai { 10.0 } /* nai.Nai [mM] */

/* Constants: phys */
physF { 9.64853415000000041e+01 } /* phys.F [C/mmol] */
physR { 8.314472 } /* phys.R [J/mol/K] */
physT { 310.0 } /* phys.T [K] */
physRTF { physR * physT / physF } /* phys.RTF [mV] */

/* Constants: erev */
erevEK { physRTF * log(extraKo / kiKi) } /* erev.E_K [mV] */
erevENa { physRTF * log(extraNao / naiNai) } /* erev.E_Na [mV] */

/* Constants: ikr */
ikrP1 { 2.06469371000000002e-03 } /* ikr.p1 [mS/uF] */
ikrP2 { 7.17061645999999969e-02 } /* ikr.p2 [1/mV] */
ikrP3 { 3.44186256999999990e-05 } /* ikr.p3 [mS/uF] */
ikrP4 { 6.17661788000000017e-02 } /* ikr.p4 [1/mV] */
ikrP5 { 4.17809103000000015e-01 } /* ikr.p5 [mS/uF] */
ikrP6 { 2.57733544000000002e-02 } /* ikr.p6 [1/mV] */
ikrP7 { 4.75152440999999995e-02 } /* ikr.p7 [mS/uF] */
ikrP8 { 2.50856877999999991e-02 } /* ikr.p8 [1/mV] */
ikrP9 { 0.1524 } /* ikr.p9 [uS] */

/* Initial conditions */
u_i {
  membraneV = -80, /* membrane.V [mV] */
  ikrI = 0, /* ikr.I [1] */
  ikrCI = 0, /* ikr.CI [1] */
  ikrO = 0, /* ikr.O [1] */
  ikrIi = 0, /* ikr.Ii [1] */
  ikrCIi = 0, /* ikr.CIi [1] */
  ikrOi = 0, /* ikr.Oi [1] */
}

dudt_i {
  diffMembraneV = 0,
  diffIkrI = 0,
  diffIkrCI = 0,
  diffIkrO = 0,
  diffIkrIi = 0,
  diffIkrCIi = 0,
  diffIkrOi = 0,
}

/* Variables: ideal */
idealVC { enginePace * 1.0 } /* ideal.V_c */

/* Variables: ikr */
ikrC { 1.0 - ikrCI - ikrI - ikrO } /* ikr.C [1] */
ikrCi { 1.0 - ikrCIi - ikrIi - ikrOi } /* ikr.Ci [1] */
ikrIKr { ikrP9 * ikrO * (membraneV - erevEK) * 50.0 } /* ikr.IKr [A/F] */
ikrIKrI { ikrP9 * ikrOi * (idealVC - erevEK) } /* ikr.IKr_i [nA] */
ikrK12 { ikrP1 * exp(ikrP2 * membraneV) } /* ikr.k12 [mS/uF] */
ikrK12I { ikrP1 * exp(ikrP2 * idealVC) } /* ikr.k12i [mS/uF] */
ikrK14 { ikrP7 * exp(-ikrP8 * membraneV) } /* ikr.k14 [mS/uF] */
ikrK14I { ikrP7 * exp(-ikrP8 * idealVC) } /* ikr.k14i [mS/uF] */
ikrK21 { ikrP3 * exp(-ikrP4 * membraneV) } /* ikr.k21 [mS/uF] */
ikrK21I { ikrP3 * exp(-ikrP4 * idealVC) } /* ikr.k21i [mS/uF] */
ikrK41 { ikrP5 * exp(ikrP6 * membraneV) } /* ikr.k41 [mS/uF] */
ikrK41I { ikrP5 * exp(ikrP6 * idealVC) } /* ikr.k41i [mS/uF] */

/* Variables: membrane */
membraneIIdeal { ikrIKrI } /* membrane.I_ideal [pA] */
membraneIIon { ikrIKr / 50.0 } /* membrane.I_ion [pA] */

/* Solve */
F_i {
  diffMembraneV,
  diffIkrI,
  diffIkrCI,
  diffIkrO,
  diffIkrIi,
  diffIkrCIi,
  diffIkrOi,
}

G_i {
  (enginePace * 1.0 - membraneV) / 1e-06,
  -ikrK14 * ikrI + ikrK41 * ikrO + ikrK12 * ikrCI - ikrK21 * ikrI,
  -ikrK12 * ikrCI + ikrK21 * ikrI + ikrK41 * ikrC - ikrK14 * ikrCI,
  -ikrK21 * ikrO + ikrK12 * ikrC + ikrK14 * ikrI - ikrK41 * ikrO,
  -ikrK14I * ikrIi + ikrK41I * ikrOi + ikrK12I * ikrCIi - ikrK21I * ikrIi,
  -ikrK12I * ikrCIi + ikrK21I * ikrIi + ikrK41I * ikrCi - ikrK14I * ikrCIi,
  -ikrK21I * ikrOi + ikrK12I * ikrCi + ikrK14I * ikrIi - ikrK41I * ikrOi,
}

/* Output */
out_i {
  ikrCI,
  ikrCIi,
  ikrI,
  ikrIi,
  ikrO,
  ikrOi,
  membraneV,
}
